features: 🌊It improves hydration & moisture barrier with illuminating effect. It also improves the oil and water balance of your skin.

🌾It contains 77.78% of Goami rice extract and 4 kinds of vegetable-originated extract complex to soothe flaky dead skin cells by forming a moisture protective layer. Sirtuin from rice protects skin damage from sun rays and helps to relieve skin stress.
⛰️Goami rice contains more hemicellulose than other rice. The rice is cultivated in a clean nature with plentiful water and fertile soil in Yeoju, Korea.
💪The product forms a protective barrier over the skin to prevent water loss, eliminate dead skin cells and provide luster and moisturization to rebalance dry and tired skin.
💛Shake it enough to make two layers mixed well before use. It has a double-layer texture that is split into water and emulsion layer. Its milky texture provides deeper moisturization and nourishment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most comfortable toner!
reviews.reviewText: This toner is so great. When you put it on, it’s immensely hydrating, and it gives my skin the healthiest glow ever! My sister also tried this, and she really liked it. This toner isn’t uncomfortable, it doesn’t make your skin rubbery, it isn’t sticky. Sometimes, this toner goes on sale for around 16 dollars instead of 20 on amazon, so be sure to watch out for those sales! The only guaranteed time that it’ll be on sale is events like Black Friday and prime day. But be warned- some people’s skin get clogged by rice products, so it’s wise to get the mini first! Also, this toner is for dry skin, mostly, but for combo, you can put it on specific areas on your face. I don’t put this toner on my forehead. This is fragrance free, so don’t worry about the scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this toner! It’s an emulsion of water and oil and basically turns into a milky texture once you shake it. It’s supposed to be shaken before use. It feels so soothing on my face and gives me an immediate glow. For reference, I use this in the morning after my morning cleanse. I just pour some in the palm of my hands and pat it onto my face. It’s milky but since it is an emulsion with oil, it’s expected to leave a bit of an oily feel on the skin that I absolutely love. It’s not greasy, or oily per se, just a refreshing emulsion. After some time, the oil sinks into the skin and gets absorbed leaving me with toned and glowy skin. I have sensitive skin and this toner works very well for me. I also have mild rosacea and it hasn’t irritated my skin. It’s soothing and I look forward to using it every morning. It’s also oddly moisturizing, especially if you do the “7 layer skin method”. I tried it once with this toner just for fun and it gave me the most radiant skin and was very hydrating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars the perfect morning toner
reviews.reviewText: I've recently gotten into Korean skincare because of TikTok, and while I was doing my research, this was one of the toners that kept popping up. So, I decided to take a leap of faith and order it, and it's one of the best toners I've ever used! In my opinion, as somebody who does get pimples and minor breakouts, this doesn't necessarily help with acne or acne prevention. This offers more hydration and a healthy glow to your skin. So, if you have acne-prone skin or if you get minor pimples, I recommend having a solid ACNE SPECIFIC routine first before incorporating this into your routine! But, overall, I do recommend this toner. I'm on my second bottle already! 🫰

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works like it should!!
reviews.reviewText: I saw this on Lemon8 and it absolutely works the way it says it does. It leaves a healthy shine without being too sticky! I can’t stand sticky product and this works well for me. I use it at night but honestly this summer I’ll probably use it for a healthy glowy look during the day!I have sensitive, oily skin and it hasn’t bothered me at all. I love it! I suggest putting it on with your hands so you don’t waste product. It’s watery but you can apply it easily with your hands. I would definitely buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It just kind of feels like putting rice water on my face (which you can make at home). It's nice. I haven't noticed any life-changing things to my face, but I probably won't order again.If you have sensitive skin though this is a good toner. I have very sensitive skin and this hasn't caused any problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice gentle toner
reviews.reviewText: This product does what it says it will do. It is a gentle, non-irritating toner. My skin feels smoother after I use it. Apparently, my cleanser is doing a great job because I have nothing left on my skin when I follow my face cleansing with this toner. Definitely a toner with a calming effect. Would buy again.Be sure to shake the bottle before use to evenly distribute ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a light product that works well with sensitive skin. Rice is very good for achieving the glass-skin look and evening your skin tone. Can be used with other products (preferably those that are plant-based if not using other Korean skincare brands)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: this toner is honestly amazing! it comes in a nice big size and really helps my skin. it has no scent and i have sensitive skin so it’s very gentle on my skin.
Este tonico es una maravilla, deja mi piel hidratada y con un glow natural. Lo uso en las noches x q se siente un poco pegajoso pero nada del otro mundo.

First time I ordered tonner on line .I am extremely please with the smooth gentle rice tonner. I love it since day one . Last long time and it is truly beautiful on my skin morning and night before I apply my tonner. Highly recommend. Will order more in the future.beautiful texter ..not irritation whats ever. Thank u .
Amazing product i have ever used you will see a magic in next morning i used in daytime only 5 drops is enough for face ..followed by daily sunscreen ....From india
肌質が柔らかくなった気がする
I really like this toner. It doesn’t dry me out (I’ve got combination skin) and it feels like it’s actually moisturising. I’m From is a great kbeauty brand :)
